roleset.name: to make difficult
roleset.note: HANDICAP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'handicap' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from handicap.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: That skepticism would leave him with an even greater credibility problem [*ICH*-1] should he return that [*T*-3]would handicap him in any effort [*] to oust the board in a proxy fight .
example.arg: in any effort [*] to oust the board in a proxy fight
